tool_description: MakCorps (www.makcorps.com ) API lets you compare hotel room prices from more than 200 websites like agoda.com, booking.com , hotels.com,amoma.com,etc. Response will consist of top 3 vendors along with the best vendor. Address , reviews, ratings , features, etc are the part of JSON response. This API is simple to implement so you can keep smiling. Our database is regularly updated to reflect new changes in Hotel prices and availability. Our API quickly responds to your queries so your app doe...
name: MakCorps - Hotel Price Comparison
title: MakCorps - Hotel Price Comparison

api_list.name: free
api_list.description: This is a free resource for testing purposes. It will give you the list of 7 hotels with top vendors. visit makcorps.com for more info

api_list.name: king
api_list.description: This endpoint allows user to get hotel room prices from more than 200 websites like agoda.com,booking.com,hotels.com,etc. And compares them. Hotel prices are based on the check-in and check-out date. visit makcorps.com for API key

api_list.name: Classic API
api_list.url: https://manthankool-makcorps-hotel-price-comparison-v1.p.rapidapi.com/flashdel/v2/Sir Stamford at Circular Quay Hotel Sydney/Sydney/USD/2/2019-09-22/2019-09-23
api_list.description: Search any hotel by its name and location and get top 6 vendors/top OTAs within the JSON response. visit - makcorps.com for API key

required_parameters.name: hotel_name
required_parameters.default: Sir Stamford at Circular Quay Hotel Sydney

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://manthankool-makcorps-hotel-price-comparison-v1.p.rapidapi.com/flashdel/v2/Sir Stamford at Circular Quay Hotel Sydney/Sydney/USD/2/2019-09-22/2019-09-23"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "manthankool-makcorps-hotel-price-comparison-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://manthankool-makcorps-hotel-price-comparison-v1.p.rapidapi.com/flashdel/v2/{hotel_name}/{location}/{currency}/{no_of_guest}/{check_in}/{check_out}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "manthankool-makcorps-hotel-price-comparison-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
